paper_abstract: This paper presents an application service provider (ASP) for finite element analysis. The basic web infrastructure has been implemented in PHP, Javascript and MySQL. Simulation services based on forms for mesh generation and ANSYS processing are presented. The main features of a pre-processing software based on the components Qt, ACIS and HOOPS are also discussed. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An application service provider for finite element analysis
